name: Pinsir
flavorText: It grips prey with its pincers until the prey is torn in half. What it can't tear, it tosses far.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Seedot
flavorText: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Kricketot
flavorText: Its legs are short. Whenever it stumbles, its stiff antennae clack with a xylophone-like sound.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 more damage for each heads.

name: Kricketune
flavorText: There is a village that hosts a contest based on the amazingly variable cries of this Pokemon.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads. Heal from this Pokemon the same amount of damage you did to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Shaymin-EX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Grass Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Does 30 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

name: Pansage
flavorText: This Pokemon dwells deep in the forest. Eating a leaf from its head whisks weariness away as if by magic.

name: Simisage
flavorText: Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.
Attack1Text: Draw 3 cards.
Attack2Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 30 more damage and heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Foongus
flavorText: It lures people in with its Poke Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a Poke Ball is unknown.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokemon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Amoonguss
flavorText: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble Poke Balls, in a swaying motion.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may use this Ability. If you do, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused and Poisoned.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Growlithe
flavorText: A Pokemon with a loyal nature, it will remain motionless until it is given an order by its Trainer.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Fire Energy card and attach it to this Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Growlithe
flavorText: A Pokemon with a loyal nature, it will remain motionless until it is given an order by its Trainer.

name: Arcanine
flavorText: Its proud and regal appearance has captured the hearts of people since long ago.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokemon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Arcanine
flavorText: Its proud and regal appearance has captured the hearts of people since long ago.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Moltres
flavorText: One of the legendary bird Pokemon. It is said that its appearance indicates the coming of spring.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Pansear
flavorText: When it is angered, the temperature of its head tuft reaches 600° F. It uses its tuft to roast berries.

name: Simisear
flavorText: It loves sweets because they become energy for the fire burning inside its body.
Attack1Text: Draw 3 cards.
Attack2Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 30 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Darumaka
flavorText: Darumaka's droppings are hot, so people used to put them in their clothes to keep themselves warm.

name: Litwick
flavorText: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leaches off the life force of any who follow it.

name: Lampent
flavorText: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Chandelure
flavorText: Being consumed in Chandelure's flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind.
Attack1Text: Does 30 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokemon. The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Reshiram
flavorText: This Pokemon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it.
Attack1Text: Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Reshiram-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokemon does 50 damage to itself.

name: Staryu
flavorText: If its body is torn, it can grow back if the red core remains. The core flashes at midnight.
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon and heal all damage from this Pokemon.

name: Starmie
flavorText: At the center of its body is a red core, which sends mysterious radio signals into the night sky.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Lapras
flavorText: It loves crossing the sea with people and Pokemon on its back. It understands human speech.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokemon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.

name: Lapras
flavorText: It loves crossing the sea with people and Pokemon on its back. It understands human speech.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Articuno
flavorText: A legendary bird Pokemon. It can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Panpour
flavorText: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.

name: Simipour
flavorText: The tuft on its head holds water. When the level runs low, it replenishes the tuft by siphoning up water with its tail.
Attack1Text: Draw 3 cards.
Attack2Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 30 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Basculin
flavorText: Red and blue Basculin usually do not get along, but sometimes members of one school mingle with the other's school.
Attack2Text: If, before this Pokemon does damage, the Defending Pokemon has no damage counters on it, this attack does nothing.

name: Vanillite
flavorText: The temperature of their breath is -58° F. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.

name: Vanillish
flavorText: Snowy mountains are this Pokemon's habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Vanilluxe
flavorText: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and attack their foes with violent blizzards.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch your Active Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon. If you do, your opponent switches his or her Active Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Does 10 more damage for each Colorless in the Defending Pokemon's Retreat Cost.

name: Frillish
flavorText: They paralyze prey with poison, then drag them down to their lairs, five miles below the surface.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Jellicent
flavorText: They propel themselves by expelling absorbed seawater from their bodies. Their favorite food is life energy.
Attack1Text: If this Pokemon was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does the same amount of damage done to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Cubchoo
flavorText: Its nose is always running. It sniffs the snot back up because the mucus provides the raw material for its moves.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon's Belt attack's base damage is 40.

name: Beartic
flavorText: It can make its breath freeze at will. Very able in the water, it swims around in northern seas and catches prey.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attack from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Kyurem-EX
Attack1Text: Discard a Special Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Hail Blizzard during your next turn.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: It occasionally uses an electric shock to recharge a fellow Pikachu that is in a weakened state.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Raichu
flavorText: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage times the number of heads.

name: Zapdos
flavorText: A legendary Pokemon that is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.
Attack1Text: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

name: Shinx
flavorText: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Shinx
flavorText: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.
Attack1Text: This Pokemon does 10 damage to itself.

name: Luxio
flavorText: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 10 damage to itself.

name: Luxio
flavorText: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Luxray
flavorText: It can see clearly through walls to track down its prey and seek its lost young.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Blitzle
flavorText: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use their flashing manes to communicate with one another.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokemon does 10 damage to itself.

name: Zebstrika
flavorText: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.
Attack1Text: Your opponent can't play any Item cards from his or her hand during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Discard all Lightning Energy attached to this Pokemon. This attack does 80 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Emolga
flavorText: The energy made in its cheeks' electric pouches is stored inside its membrane and released while it is gliding.
Attack1Text: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Zekrom
flavorText: This Pokemon appears in legends. In its tail, it has a giant generator that creates electricity.
Attack1Text: Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 40 damage to itself.

name: Zekrom-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Grimer
flavorText: It was born when sludge in a dirty stream was exposed to the moon's X-rays. It appears among filth.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Muk
flavorText: A toxic fluids seeps from its body. The fluid instantly kills plants and trees on contact.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokemon between turns.

name: Mewtwo-EX
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to this Pokemon and the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Ralts
flavorText: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or Pokemon, its body warms up slightly.

name: Kirlia
flavorText: If its Trainer becomes happy, it overflows with energy, dancing joyously while spinning about.
Attack2Text: Does 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Gardevoir
flavorText: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
Ability1Text: Each basic Psychic Energy attached to your Psychic Pokemon provides PsychicPsychic Energy. You can't apply more than 1 Psychic Mirage Ability at a time.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Munna
flavorText: It eats the dreams of people and Pokemon. When it eats a pleasant dream, it expels pink-colored mist.

name: Musharna
flavorText: With the mist from its forehead, it can create shapes of things from dreams it has eaten.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Put the other card back on top of your deck.
Attack1Text: This Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Darmanitan
flavorText: When weakened in battle, it transforms into a stone statue. Then it sharpens its mind and fights on mentally.
Attack1Text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw a number of cards equal to the number of cards in your opponent's hand.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin for each Energy attached to this Pokemon. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

name: Elgyem
flavorText: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent's brain, causing unendurable headaches.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Beheeyem
flavorText: It can manipulate an opponent's memory. Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three different-colored fingers.
Attack1Text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand. Choose a card from there and put it on the bottom of your opponent's deck.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Riolu
flavorText: It has the peculiar power of being able to see emotions such as joy and rage in the form of waves.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Lucario
flavorText: A well-trained one can sense auras to identify and take in the feelings of creatures over half a mile away.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokemon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Hippopotas
flavorText: It shuts its nostrils tight then travels through sand as if walking. They form colonies of around ten.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Hippowdon
flavorText: It is surprisingly quick to anger. It holds its mouth agape as a display of its strength.
Attack1Text: You may move 1 Energy attached to this Pokemon to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Mienfoo
flavorText: They has mastered elegant combos. As they concentrate, their battle moves become swifter and more precise.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 times the number of heads.

name: Mienshao
flavorText: They use the long fur on their arms as a whip to strike their opponents.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for 2 Pokemon Tool cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Sneasel
flavorText: A smart and sneaky Pokemon. A pair may work together to steal eggs by having one lure the parents away.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Weavile
flavorText: Evolution made it even more devious. It communicates by clawing signs in boulders.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon has no Pokemon Tool card attached to it, this attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Nuzleaf
flavorText: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.
Attack1Text: Move an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.

name: Shiftry
flavorText: By flapping its leafy fan, it can whip up gusts of 100 ft/second that can level houses.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. Your opponent shuffles that Pokemon and all cards attached to it into his or her deck.
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Scraggy
flavorText: It immediately headbutts anyones that makes eye contact with it. Its skull is massively thick.
Attack1Text: Heal 40 damage from this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Scrafty
flavorText: It can smash concrete blocks with its kicking attacks. The one with the biggest crest is the group leader.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon has fewer remaining HP than the Defending Pokemon, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Bronzor
flavorText: There are researchers who believe this Pokemon reflected like a mirror in the distant past.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Bronzong
flavorText: It brought rains by opening portals to another world. It was revered as a bringer of plentiful harvests.
Ability1Text: Damage can't be healed from any Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's). (Damage counters can still be moved.)
Attack1Text: Does 10 more damage for each card in your opponent's hand.

name: Ferroseed
flavorText: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.
Attack1Text: This Pokemon does 60 damage to itself.

name: Jigglypuff
flavorText: When it wavers its big, round eyes, it begins singing a lullaby that makes everyone drowsy.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Wigglytuff
flavorText: Its fine fur feels sublime to the touch. It can expand its body by inhaling air.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage times the number of your Pokemon that have the Round attack.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Meowth
flavorText: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Persian
flavorText: A very haughty Pokemon. Among fans, the size of the jewel in its forehead is a topic of much talk.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

name: Regigigas-EX
Attack1Text: You may do 20 more damage. If you do, this Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.
Attack2Text: Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.

name: Pidove
flavorText: These Pokemon live in cities. They are accustomed to people. Flocks often gather in parks and plazas.
Attack1Text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.

name: Minccino
flavorText: These Pokemon prefer a tidy habitat. They are always sweeping and dusting, using their tails as brooms.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Cinccino
flavorText: Their white fur is coated in a special oil that makes it easy for them to deflect attacks.
Ability1Text: If any damage is done to this Pokemon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that damage.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon's Echoed Voice attack does 50 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Shaymin-EX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Grass Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Does 30 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

name: Reshiram-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokemon does 50 damage to itself.

name: Kyurem-EX
Attack1Text: Discard a Special Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Hail Blizzard during your next turn.

name: Zekrom-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Mewtwo-EX
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to this Pokemon and the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Regigigas-EX
Attack1Text: You may do 20 more damage. If you do, this Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.
Attack2Text: Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.

name: Emboar
flavorText: This extremely rare Pokemon is a different color than usual. It is very hard to find.
Ability1Text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Fire Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokemon.

name: Chandelure
flavorText: This extremely rare Pokemon is a different color than usual. It is very hard to find.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, you may put 3 damage counters on your opponent's Pokemon in any way you like.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned and Confused.

name: Zoroark
flavorText: This extremely rare Pokemon is a different color than usual. It is very hard to find.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks and use it as this attack.

name: Hydreigon
flavorText: This extremely rare Pokemon is a different color than usual. It is very hard to find.
Ability1Text: All Energy attached to this Pokemon are Darkness Energy instead of their usual type.
Attack1Text: Does 40 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
